RAW_FIR:
FILE: [ResolvedTo(IMPORTS)] localFunctionInsideFunctionLiteralScript.kts
    context(<script>@kotlin.script.templates.standard.ScriptTemplateWithArgs)
    SCRIPT: [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] 
        [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] lval args: R|kotlin/Array<kotlin/String>|

        public open [ResolvedTo(STATUS)] class ClassWithParameter : R|kotlin/Any| {
            public [ResolvedTo(STATUS)] [ContainingClassKey=ClassWithParameter] constructor([ResolvedTo(STATUS)] i: R|() -> kotlin/Unit|): R|one/ClassWithParameter| {
                super<R|kotlin/Any|>()
            }

        }

        public final [ResolvedTo(BODY_RESOLVE)] class TopLevelClass : R|one/ClassWithParameter| {
            public [ResolvedTo(BODY_RESOLVE)] [ContainingClassKey=TopLevelClass] constructor(): R|one/TopLevelClass| {
                super<R|one/ClassWithParameter|>([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun <anonymous>(): R|kotlin/Unit| <inline=Unknown>  {
                    local final [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun foo([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] param: R|kotlin/String|): R|kotlin/Unit| {
                    }

                }
                )
            }

        }

        }

                super<R|one/ClassWithParameter|>([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun <anonymous>(): R|kotlin/Unit| <inline=Unknown>  {
                    local final [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun foo([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] param: R|kotlin/String|): R|kotlin/Unit| {

                super<R|kotlin/Any|>()
            }

        }

        public final [ResolvedTo(BODY_RESOLVE)] class TopLevelClass : R|one/ClassWithParameter| {

                super<R|one/ClassWithParameter|>([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun <anonymous>(): R|kotlin/Unit| <inline=Unknown>  {

SUPER_TYPES:

    context(<script>@kotlin.script.templates.standard.ScriptTemplateWithArgs)
    SCRIPT: [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] 
        [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] lval args: R|kotlin/Array<kotlin/String>|

        public open [ResolvedTo(STATUS)] class ClassWithParameter : R|kotlin/Any| {
            public [ResolvedTo(STATUS)] [ContainingClassKey=ClassWithParameter] constructor([ResolvedTo(STATUS)] i: R|() -> kotlin/Unit|): R|one/ClassWithParameter| {
                super<R|kotlin/Any|>()
            }

        }

        public final [ResolvedTo(BODY_RESOLVE)] class TopLevelClass : R|one/ClassWithParameter| {
            public [ResolvedTo(BODY_RESOLVE)] [ContainingClassKey=TopLevelClass] constructor(): R|one/TopLevelClass| {
                super<R|one/ClassWithParameter|>([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun <anonymous>(): R|kotlin/Unit| <inline=Unknown>  {
                    local final [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun foo([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] param: R|kotlin/String|): R|kotlin/Unit| {
                    }

                }
                )
            }

        }

        [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] lval args: R|kotlin/Array<kotlin/String>|

            public [ResolvedTo(STATUS)] [ContainingClassKey=ClassWithParameter] constructor([ResolvedTo(STATUS)] i: R|() -> kotlin/Unit|): R|one/ClassWithParameter| {
                super<R|kotlin/Any|>()
            }

        }

        public final [ResolvedTo(BODY_RESOLVE)] class TopLevelClass : R|one/ClassWithParameter| {
            public [ResolvedTo(BODY_RESOLVE)] [ContainingClassKey=TopLevelClass] constructor(): R|one/TopLevelClass| {
                super<R|one/ClassWithParameter|>([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun <anonymous>(): R|kotlin/Unit| <inline=Unknown>  {
                    local final [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun foo([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] param: R|kotlin/String|): R|kotlin/Unit| {
                    }

                }
                )
            }

        }

            }

        }

                super<R|one/ClassWithParameter|>([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun <anonymous>(): R|kotlin/Unit| <inline=Unknown>  {

                }

            }

    context(<script>@kotlin.script.templates.standard.ScriptTemplateWithArgs)

        [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] lval args: R|kotlin/Array<kotlin/String>|

            public [ResolvedTo(STATUS)] [ContainingClassKey=ClassWithParameter] constructor([ResolvedTo(STATUS)] i: R|() -> kotlin/Unit|): R|one/ClassWithParameter| {
                super<R|kotlin/Any|>()
            }

        }

        public final [ResolvedTo(BODY_RESOLVE)] class TopLevelClass : R|one/ClassWithParameter| {
            public [ResolvedTo(BODY_RESOLVE)] [ContainingClassKey=TopLevelClass] constructor(): R|one/TopLevelClass| {
                super<R|one/ClassWithParameter|>([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun <anonymous>(): R|kotlin/Unit| <inline=Unknown>  {
                    local final [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun foo([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] param: R|kotlin/String|): R|kotlin/Unit| {
                    }

                }
                )
            }

        }

            }

        }

                super<R|one/ClassWithParameter|>([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun <anonymous>(): R|kotlin/Unit| <inline=Unknown>  {

                    }

                }

            }

    context(<script>@kotlin.script.templates.standard.ScriptTemplateWithArgs)
    SCRIPT: [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] 
        [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] lval args: R|kotlin/Array<kotlin/String>|

        public open [ResolvedTo(STATUS)] class ClassWithParameter : R|kotlin/Any| {
            public [ResolvedTo(STATUS)] [ContainingClassKey=ClassWithParameter] constructor([ResolvedTo(STATUS)] i: R|() -> kotlin/Unit|): R|one/ClassWithParameter| {
                super<R|kotlin/Any|>()
            }

        }

        public final [ResolvedTo(BODY_RESOLVE)] class TopLevelClass : R|one/ClassWithParameter| {
            public [ResolvedTo(BODY_RESOLVE)] [ContainingClassKey=TopLevelClass] constructor(): R|one/TopLevelClass| {
                super<R|one/ClassWithParameter|>([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun <anonymous>(): R|kotlin/Unit| <inline=Unknown>  {
                    local final [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun foo([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] param: R|kotlin/String|): R|kotlin/Unit| {
                    }

                }
                )
            }

        }

    context(<script>@kotlin.script.templates.standard.ScriptTemplateWithArgs)
    SCRIPT: [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] 
        [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] lval args: R|kotlin/Array<kotlin/String>|

        public open [ResolvedTo(STATUS)] class ClassWithParameter : R|kotlin/Any| {
            public [ResolvedTo(STATUS)] [ContainingClassKey=ClassWithParameter] constructor([ResolvedTo(STATUS)] i: R|() -> kotlin/Unit|): R|one/ClassWithParameter| {
                super<R|kotlin/Any|>()
            }

        }

        public final [ResolvedTo(BODY_RESOLVE)] class TopLevelClass : R|one/ClassWithParameter| {
            public [ResolvedTo(BODY_RESOLVE)] [ContainingClassKey=TopLevelClass] constructor(): R|one/TopLevelClass| {
                super<R|one/ClassWithParameter|>([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun <anonymous>(): R|kotlin/Unit| <inline=Unknown>  {
                    local final [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun foo([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] param: R|kotlin/String|): R|kotlin/Unit| {
                    }

                }
                )
            }

        }


BODY_RESOLVE:
FILE: [ResolvedTo(IMPORTS)] localFunctionInsideFunctionLiteralScript.kts
    context(<script>@kotlin.script.templates.standard.ScriptTemplateWithArgs)
    SCRIPT: [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] 
        [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] lval args: R|kotlin/Array<kotlin/String>|

        public open [ResolvedTo(STATUS)] class ClassWithParameter : R|kotlin/Any| {
            public [ResolvedTo(STATUS)] [ContainingClassKey=ClassWithParameter] constructor([ResolvedTo(STATUS)] i: R|() -> kotlin/Unit|): R|one/ClassWithParameter| {
                super<R|kotlin/Any|>()
            }

        }

        public final [ResolvedTo(BODY_RESOLVE)] class TopLevelClass : R|one/ClassWithParameter| {
            public [ResolvedTo(BODY_RESOLVE)] [ContainingClassKey=TopLevelClass] constructor(): R|one/TopLevelClass| {
                super<R|one/ClassWithParameter|>([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun <anonymous>(): R|kotlin/Unit| <inline=Unknown>  {
                    local final [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun foo([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] param: R|kotlin/String|): R|kotlin/Unit| {
                    }

                }
                )
            }

        }


FILE RAW TO BODY:
FILE: [ResolvedTo(IMPORTS)] localFunctionInsideFunctionLiteralScript.kts
    context(<script>@kotlin.script.templates.standard.ScriptTemplateWithArgs)
    SCRIPT: [ResolvedTo(BODY_RESOLVE)] 
        [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] lval args: R|kotlin/Array<kotlin/String>|

        public? open [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] class ClassWithParameter : R|kotlin/Any| {
            public? [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] [ContainingClassKey=ClassWithParameter] constructor([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] i: ( () -> Unit )): R|one/ClassWithParameter| {
                super<R|kotlin/Any|>()
            }

        }

        public? final? [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] class TopLevelClass : ClassWithParameter {
            public? [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] [ContainingClassKey=TopLevelClass] constructor(): R|one/TopLevelClass| {
                super<ClassWithParameter>([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun <implicit>.<anonymous>(): <implicit> <inline=Unknown>  {
                    local final? [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun foo([ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] param: String): R|kotlin/Unit| {
                    }

                }
                )
            }

        }
